It is easy to get to Mars, which is near

, from I-79 or I-76. From I-79, take exit 78 for PA-228E towards Mars, then turn left on Pittsburgh St. From the south on I-76, take exit 39 to PA-8N towards Butler, then take a left on PA-228W, then turn right on Mars-Valencia Rd. From the north on I-76, take exit 28 to merge onto I-79N and follow the directions for US-79.
Mars is a compact little town with ample parking for those with cars, but convenient on foot.

value: Spaceship Statue — in the best of American roadside kitsch traditions
Funny signs around town (e.g., "Mars Laundromat," "Mars Travel," "Mars High School," "Chuck Kennedy's Cars from Mars," etc.).

The bunch of Martian hotels are located outside of the town center, by the highway junction of I-79 and I-76.
